Name: Pirate Queen
Ingredients: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: MUDDLE strawberry in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass over a large cube or chunk of block ice.
Review: Lightly spicy with an attractive underlying bready fruitiness from the fresh strawberry and genever.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2014 by Jillian Vose for the 3rd volume of The Dead Rabbit menu, New York City, USA.
